name: cheyenne
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital and the largest city of the US state of Wyoming: Twenty-four people turned out to discuss proposed rule changes affecting state parks and historic sites at a public meeting in Cheyenne. Fourteen inches piled up in Cheyenne, Wyoming, its fourth heaviest single-day snowfall on record.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Cheyenne .He spent five years working as a nurse in Cheyenne .The group went on to win the Stars of Tomorrow competition and performed throughout Cheyenne.He started his career at the Wyoming Attorney General's Office in Cheyenne.Curt Gowdy State Park is located 24 miles west of Cheyenne.
